channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16744] Procedure V2 - Lock procedures to allow clients to acquire locks on tables/namespaces/regions
item.description:
Will help us get rid of ZK locks.
Will be useful for external tools like hbck, future backup manager, etc.
item.summary: Procedure V2 - Lock procedures to allow clients to acquire locks on tables/namespaces/regions

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
